description: This source file implements functions for handling TLV (Type-Length-Value) structures specifically related to WiFi configurations in the RDK WiFi HAL. It contains functions to retrieve (`get_tlv`) and set (`set_tlv`) TLV entries within a provided byte buffer, enabling manipulation of WiFi-related attributes in a TLV format.

methods.name: wifi_tlv_t * get_tlv(unsigned char * buff,unsigned short attrib,unsigned short len)
methods.description: Searches through a buffer for a TLV entry matching a given attribute ID and returns a pointer to it if found.

methods.name: wifi_tlv_t * set_tlv(unsigned char * buff,unsigned short attrib,unsigned short len,unsigned char * val)
methods.description: Populates a buffer with a TLV entry given attribute ID, length, and value, and returns a pointer to the position after the TLV.

ctags.name: get_tlv
ctags.pattern: /^wifi_tlv_t *get_tlv(unsigned char *buff, unsigned short attrib, unsigned short len)$/
ctags.signature: (unsigned char * buff,unsigned short attrib,unsigned short len)

ctags.name: set_tlv
ctags.pattern: /^wifi_tlv_t *set_tlv(unsigned char *buff, unsigned short attrib, unsigned short len, unsigned cha/
ctags.signature: (unsigned char * buff,unsigned short attrib,unsigned short len,unsigned char * val)
